author: Caitlin Welsh
title: 'Please stay at home, we beg you': Respiratory nurses send powerful message
description: For some reason, despite lockdowns, shutdowns, and a fair few nervous breakdowns, there are still people not taking the coronavirus pandemic seriously. Coronavirus spreads easily and asymptomatically, and the only way to slow it down so that intensive care un…
